commit message: Issue #18: Refactoring to move logic for sharing and resetting the log out of LogActivity
Issue 18: Introduced LogActionsActivity: a transparent intermediate activity which allows sharing logic between a PreferenceActivity and a FragmentActivity.
Issue #18: Improve the behavior of the progress dialog when resetting the log
Issue #18: Improved the theme for the dialogs for sharing/resetting the log file.
Issue #18: Show different message in the progress dialog for sharing or purging the log
Issue #18: Renamed 'purge' and 'reset' logs to 'clear' logs
Issue #18: rename 'Show log file' to 'View log file'
Issue #18: added proguard mapping file for 1.0.12
